colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS RGYUN 'KHYER DU BA BA'I TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA RIN CHEN BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GZHAN DU DU MA LA NYE BAR MKHO BAR MTHONG NAS, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I DPA' GCIG GIS SGRUB THABS DE NYID GZHIR GZHAG STE NAG PO 'GRO SHES KYI TSUL DU BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RIM PA CHOS 'DZIN RDOR LEGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
